nodes.text: Gamorrean Ale was a type of ale served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. During that year, the human male Dolin visited Oga's Cantina and drank the ale, which he compared favorably to the sour beer made by his settlement. The drink was reportedly a favorite beverage of the Weequay business owner Hondo Ohnaka.
The drink shared its name with the eponymous species native to Gamorr.

Gamorrean Ale has been available to customers at the out-of-universe Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge since the opening of the theme park in 2019. It is brewed by New Belgium Brewing Company from Fort Collins, Colorado, and is 5.8% alcohol by volume. The menu describes it as, "Red ale with roasted caramel, hop character, and touch of grapefruit."
